name: Introduction to Web3
shortDescription: A beginner-friendly course on Web3 fundamentals
fullDescription: This course aims to introduce newcomers to the world of Web3, covering basic concepts, technologies, and use cases.

name: Advanced DeFi Protocols
shortDescription: Deep dive into decentralized finance protocols
fullDescription: This course will explore advanced topics in DeFi, focusing on popular protocols, their mechanisms, and potential risks.

name: NFT Creation Workshop
shortDescription: Learn to create and launch your own NFTs
fullDescription: This hands-on workshop will guide participants through the process of creating, minting, and launching their own NFT collections.
